meanings.definition: An exceptionally large or powerful school.
meanings.sent1: The superschools in our city have huge buildings and many students.
meanings.sent2: The new superschools in the area offer advanced technology and top-notch facilities.
meanings.sent3: The superschools decided to have a race to see which one was the biggest!
meanings.sent4: In the world of education, these superschools are like giants towering over the rest.
meanings.sent5: The idea of superschools is like imagining a school that is as big as a city!

meanings.definition: A school that surpasses others in size, resources, or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The superschools in our town have more teachers and classrooms than any other school.
meanings.sent2: Students dream of attending one of the prestigious superschools known for academic excellence.
meanings.sent3: The superschools held a talent show to prove they were the best in the region.
meanings.sent4: These superschools shine brightly in the education galaxy, outshining all others.
meanings.sent5: The concept of superschools is like a beacon of success in the world of learning.
